p: Erythrophagocytosis is a process, where the senescent RBCs are phagocytosed by macrophage ( Klei et al., 2017). Within the macrophage, the senescent RBC undergoes hemolysis, and the components, such as heme iron, are being recycled. The reused iron will be carried back to bone marrow for erythropoiesis ( Gottlieb et al., 2012). Thus, the disorders in iron recycling can result in anemia ( Batchelor et al., 2020). Here, the potential effects of jujube on erythrophagocytosis were summarized ( Figure 4).
